0000100101100010 1001100101101001 0 -> sum: 1010001011001011, cout: 0

1110100011000111 1000010100011000 0 -> sum: 0110110111011111, cout: 1
0101001101000000 1100101000000111 1 -> sum: 0001110101001000, cout: 1
1011100010010010 1000100010001110 0 -> sum: 0100000100100000, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
